Summary: Great value and quality, battery life a bit shortGreat balance of value and acoustic quality. Obviously not studio quality, but probably one of the best 'sweet spot' speakers for most people. Sounds a bit 'bass muddy' out of the box, but spending a little time with phone/device EQ easily fixes that for more crisp, detailed sound. Ideal to keep volume below 70% for best sound and prolong life. Battery life isn't amazing, but build quality is decent for the price. Definitely recommend.
